div.p: East Harlem Scholars Academies are community-based Pre-K to 12 public charter schools operated by East Harlem Tutorial Program.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-collage combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

img.alt: Our Mission - East Harlem Scholars Academies are public charter schools that prepare students with the skills, strength of character and emotional well-being to excel academically, lead in their communities and realize their best possible selves.

div.p: East Harlem Scholars Academies are public charter schools that prepare students with the skills, strength of character and emotional well-being to excel academically, lead in their communities and realize their best possible selves.

What started more than 60 years ago as a reading group in the living room of a community leader has grown into a multi-dimensional educational program that includes five charter schools. East Harlem Scholars Academies are committed to providing youth in the neighborhood with the academic excellence and supports needed to thrive. Join us!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: All children can and will succeed when provided a great education. We challenge our students with a demanding academic program, and challenge ourselves to examine issues of racism and identity and model the learning and dialogue needed to ensure a more equitable future for young people of color. LEARN MORE

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Our Scholars are busy! Whether it’s a spelling bee, a holiday performance, a basketball game or a field trip, we are dogged in our pursuit of activities that bolster our rigorous academics and allow Scholars to explore their interests. Check here for updates! LEARN MORE

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: If you are a results-oriented, highly motivated and culturally responsive educator who believes that all children can achieve and become their best possible selves, we encourage you to apply to join our phenomenal team! LEARN MORE

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: East Harlem Scholars achieve academic success -- and while we are thrilled with their track record, we know that real success comes arming our Scholars with the knowledge and the tools to become the next generation of change-makers. LEARN MORE

East Harlem Tutorial Program is committed to serving 25 percent of East Harlem children by 2025, and East Harlem Scholars Academies are contributing more and more to that goal. Our two elementary schools and two middle schools serve more than 950 students from Pre-K through 8th grade, and our first-ever high school is opening its doors this fall. Our high school Scholars will also benefit from the success of our renowned after-school and summer programs, which are available to students as they develop their college plans.

To be challenged in an academically rigorous, culturally responsive environment? To be recognized for the sum of ..."},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/5vdTA7TlN3E?wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" scrolling=\"no\" allowfullscreen=\"\" width=\"854\" height=\"480\" frameborder=\"0\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://youtu.be/5vdTA7TlN3E","width":854,"height":480,"providerName":"YouTube","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5vdTA7TlN3E/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.h3: OF FAMILIES SAY THEY ARE SATISFIED WITH THE EDUCATION THEIR CHILD RECEIVED THIS YEAR*
OF TEACHERS AGREED OR STRONGLY AGREED THAT TEACHERS WORK CLOSELY WITH FAMILIES TO MEET STUDENTS’ NEEDS*
of seniors participating in our after-school program were accepted to at least three colleges**

div.h4:
* Source: NYC DOE 2016-2017 School Quality Reports
** Excludes students accepted early decision.

p.strong: Build Potential. Build Community. Build Yourself. Build Love.

div.p: Support our brilliant young Scholars as they reach their full academic potential and realize their best selves. Through your work, you will strengthen our commitment to the students and families of East Harlem and help build authentic community partnerships. You will challenge the status quo and model the learning and dialogue that begins to combat systemic racism. You will ensure a more equitable future for all young people. And you will join an organization that is committed professional development and the well being of its staff.
Our student-centered approach fosters critical-thinking skills and a love of learning! Apply no to support our Scholars as they excel academically and begin to lead in their communities.
You can make a difference! Volunteer tutors, homework helpers, mentors, friends, camp counselors, and coaches have a lasting impact on our scholars. Apply now to lend a hand!
With your support, EHTP can achieve its goal of providing high-quality, tuition-free programs to one in four East Harlem students by 2025. A more equitable future for all young people is possible!

div.p: Sign up to receive news and updates.
